What are some potential use cases for creating a currency on Verus, as described in the text?

The text describes two potential use cases for creating a currency on Verus. The first is creating a currency that is backed by a specific, auditable store of gold, and the second is creating a token for a Kickstarter-like project. These use cases demonstrate the flexibility and potential applications of creating currencies on Verus.

To create a currency of a specific name, you need an ID of the same name. The controller of this ID is the only one who can create a currency of that name, and they can only do so once.
